timeline.bodyText:
this section looks weird now. We have:
1. Integrations
1.1 Apache Lucene
2. Hibernate
3. Spring

IMO, it would be better to "promote" Apache Lucene to top-level (so it would be 1 instead of 1.1) or bring the hibernate/spring one level down (1.2 hibernate, 1.3 spring)
WDYT?
